  • Creating a new project from a template
  • View page source

Creating a new project from a templateÂ¶

Another option for creating projects is the procedure via the operation of the pop-up menu Create from template. A new project can be created based on the project templates in the system. The steps appear as follows:

  1. Click on New from Template

  2. If more than one template exists in the system: Select the template in the proposal catalog :guilabel:`Select Project Template

  3. Enter project master data

  4. Select Project Manager

When you create a new project from a template, the template is copied. The main differences to copying are:

  • You must select a project manager

  • The template flag is automatically removed

  • The assignment to a parent project is automatically removed.
